_header: John of Damascene telleth us the story / of Barlaam…
Title(s): South English Legendary ; Barlaam and Josaphat
Subjects: saints’ lives; Barlaam and Josaphat, life of
_description: Barlaam and Josaphat, in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Ihon of damascene telleþ vs þe storiȝeof barlaam
                    & iosaphat to haue hem In memoryȝe…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…now bidde we god of heuin þat euer was & isþat
                    he vs for here boþe loue bring to heuin blis
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden.
         Paderborn: F. Schoningh, 1875: 113-48.
MacDonald,  K. S.,
                        ed.  
             The Story of Barlaam and Joasaph, Buddhism and Christianity.
         Calcutta, 1895: 113.
